metadata.name: HackTool - SysmonEOP Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the PoC that can be used to exploit Sysmon CVE-2022-41120

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sysmoneop.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=22f4089eb8aba31e1bb162c6d9bf72e5')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=5123fa4c4384d431cd0d893eeb49bbec'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the PoC that can be used to exploit Sysmon CVE-2022-41120
